page.title: 13Day 2 in life of Bethany.
page.content: We stop to leave Kirsty(3yrs)with friend,who takes her to Nursery School at Woodford Halse,8miles away.Kirsty goes to Nursery 5 mornings a week.Now on to Staverton to take Bethany to school.12.00Kirsty comes back from her Nursery;we lunch together.Ham,crisps, raw carrot for K.,ham and tomatoes for Mummy.We drink apple juice.14.00:Mummy gardening,Kirsty plays in the garden. 03.45:we take Diggy the dog for a walk 04.25:Bethany returns on school bus,we go and meet her.04.30:they go out to play on their bikes.B.learned today to ride her bike without stabilizers:she's very pleased with herself.05.15:teatime for B.and K.They have fish fingers, baked beans and chips,mousse to follow, apple juice to drink.05.35:one of B's best t.v.shows:Rolf Harris cartoons.06. 00:Daddy's home early,has tea with Mum.
